readability_reflection: I found string concatenation more readable because of the ability to simply replace the variable string in the concatenation. It may also be because I have used string concatenation more than interpolation in the past.
comprehension_debugging: Some challenges that I faced were recognizing whether special characters like brackets or parentheses would be a part of the output or not.
preference_rationale: I would use string concatenation because it makes sense to me that adding strings together would just make a longer string.
learning_curve: I have learned concatenation in AP Computer Science principles, which has provided me with familiarity with it over interpolation.
suggestions_improvement: I would recommend that these methods could be changed to enhance readability would be having a keyword or a separate symbol instead of the traditional ones that we use.
